name: ArcheoMancer
description:
You're an archeologist trying to find buried treasure in the depths of a cavern !

Be careful though, if your light fades out you will die...

You can collect light fossils to replenish your light.

A/D to move left and right & left click to mine blocks with your pickaxe.

You can also jump with Space and climb ladders with W/S.

Have fun !
